title: PhantaCity
overview: PhantaCity is a brand new original variety created by Momo's exclusive title, Hunan Satellite TV and Coolbot Culture. He Jiong will be the host of the program, and the famous singer Wang Fei is a guest of the show. The program created an immersive performance stage, with music performance as the main form, the guests provided inspiration, professionals integrated creation, and finally completed a short story of music.
